attributes.action: Stop ITV from showing any England football matches during the World cup.
attributes.additional_details:
The stats
BBC Played 13, won 9, drawn 1, lost 3. A win percentage of 69%
ITV Played 10, won 1, drawn 5, lost 4. A win percentage of 10%. 
Incidentally the team England beat on ITV was Trinidad and Tobago.
attributes.background: It's in the nations interest that England stand the best chance to get through to the World Cup final. It is statistically proven ITV are bad luck for our national team. England have won 1 game in the last 6 world cups whilst on the BBC England have played 13 and won 9.
